title: For His Honor
description: When billionaire businessman Red Jameson lost his company, he decided to leave everything behind--including his young fianc√©, Nicole Masters. Now Nicole's faced with a life that doesn't include the man she's fallen in love with--the man that she still believes loves her with all of his heart. Red Jameson's demons have finally come back to haunt them both, and not all of his demons are figments of his imagination. And there's something else that Nicole is wrestling with--a secret that she can't share with anybody but the man she loves.A secret that could change both of their lives forever.Will Red finally realize the truth about their love? Or will Nicole's secrets finally and irrevocably pull them apart?
author: Kelly Favor
